pageContext.claim: “Biden can't put two sentences together. They wheel him out. He goes up -- he repeats -- they ask him questions. He reads a teleprompter and then he goes back into his basement. You tell me the American people want to have that in an age where we're in trouble with other nations that are looking to do numbers on us.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a frequent line of attack from the Trump campaign over the summer, but there is no evidence that Biden relies exclusively on teleprompters. Moreover, most politicians use them for major speeches.
